channel.title: Coding on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog

item.title: Converting between GIS raster data formats using gdal_translate
item.description: Do you need to convert GIS raster data between different formats? Here is how gdal_translate could help you!

item.title: Passing environment variables to a docker container using docker-compose
item.description: Suppose you have a containerized script which you want behave differently based on configuration. Let’s see how to do that!

item.title: Independent segment angle from direction
item.description: A useful snippet to figure out the intersection angle of two segments using the direction vectors.
